titleStmt.title: Humilitie, the saints liuerie; or, The habit of humilitie, the grace of graces fetched out of the wardrobe of Saint Paul. As it was deliuered (for substance) in two sermons at Blacke-Fryers in London, the one, September 22. the other, October 6. 1624. By Daniel Cavvdrey minister of the Word of God, at little Ilford in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Cawdrey, Daniel, 1588-1664.

titleStmt.title: Humilitie, the saints liuerie; or, The habit of humilitie, the grace of graces fetched out of the wardrobe of Saint Paul. As it was deliuered (for substance) in two sermons at Blacke-Fryers in London, the one, September 22. the other, October 6. 1624. By Daniel Cavvdrey minister of the Word of God, at little Ilford in Essex.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at the great west doore of Saint Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
